options.content:
# Schema Comparison Dashboard (PostgreSQL)
Compare table schema between two environments - Columns, Types, Indexes, Foreign Keys

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT application FROM schema_profiles ORDER BY application
list.label: Application
list.name: application
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT application FROM schema_profiles ORDER BY application

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM schema_profiles WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
list.label: Environment 1
list.name: env1
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM schema_profiles WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM schema_profiles WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment
list.label: Environment 2
list.name: env2
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM schema_profiles WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} ORDER BY environment

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM schema_profiles WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND (environment = ${env1:singlequote} OR environment = ${env2:singlequote}) ORDER BY table_name
list.label: Table
list.name: table_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM schema_profiles WHERE application = ${application:singlequote} AND (environment = ${env1:singlequote} OR environment = ${env2:singlequote}) ORDER BY table_name
